p: Two ml of paraffin was added to the same volume of cell-free supernatant in a glass test tube. The tube was mixed vigorously for 2 min and then left at room temperature for 24 h. E24 was calculated as (h 1/h 0) Ã— 100; where h 1 is the height of emulsified layer (mm) after 24 h and h 0 is the total height of liquid column (mm) ( 11).
